name: Nuclear Family
description:
Are you a fan of resource management games? Ever wondered how it feels to raise an adorable and not at all excessively needy plutonium rod? If so, look no further, Nuclear Family is the game for you. Nuclear Family is a game created for Ludum Dare #46, to correspond with the theme of “Keep it Alive”. In this game you’ll need to keep your wits about you as you raise these adorably anthropomorphised mutagenic rods in a battle to keep them alive.

Your role in a power-plant consists of three tasks: Feeding the rods, cooling the rods and, once they’ve hit maturity, allowing them to fulfil their lifelong goal of powering the nearby city.

Best of luck Operator!

Controls

A & D to move around

E to Interact

Credits 

Blue Suit Operator Zigg - Design, Tech & Foley Audio

Yellow Suit Operator GamesOgre - Art, Animation, Soundtrack & Trailer

We had Blast making this hope you enjoy!
